name: T - Nelson Nina
_source: speak;Nina; Hey! You're that thief that stole all the gold off that Umbran ship, right?
speak;Nelson; Hmph, yeah, I did it. Were you also hired to kill me?

speak;Nina; No, I just like to praise a job well done.{w} A skilled thief like me appreciates someone who pulls off an impressive job.{w} Though, getting away with it is the only thing I can say you did poorly.
speak;Nelson; Pft, yeah right.{w} Who do you think you are to talk down to me like that?{w} How skilled of a thief do you think you are?
speak;Nina; Who do I think I am?{w} Ever heard of <red>The Lawbreaker</> where you come from?
speak;Nina; The one and only!{w} So watch who you're talking to next time!
speak;Nelson; You're{tgm}...{tgm}You're famous!{w} You're supposed to be the thief who can steal anything{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Thieves and rogues dream of becoming you!
speak;Nina; Well, not everyone can be as cunning and skilled as me,{w} but keep watching and maybe you'll pick up a thing or two.
